Text: hummm...don't seem to work for me - no response when I attempt to open.....am I missing something???
this one seems don't need serial number, it worked without it.

I'm a longtime user of Disk Warrior.  I backup to an external drive once a month then boot to that BU and run DW on my main boot drive.  Every time I do this I am no longer able to boot to the main boot drive.  DW does something to it and I'm forced to use the restart-optionkey which lists my bootable options.  The main boot drive is not identified by its name but does show as EFI.  If I chose it I can boot into my main boot drive.

So something is NOT kosher with DW v4.2

I don't know about this 4.1 r42 release.

DiskWarrior 4.2 is published on 2009-08-28. Why do you seed something that is already older than 1.5 years? Why this file is 2 times bigger than the others here on PB?

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4474435/DiskWarrior_4.1.1_(with_s_n)

This IS the latest release, there is no 4.11 release (Duh...)

I found how to fix the reboot from main drive I note above.  Simply go to Utilities and run Disk Utitlity - Disk Repair.  It resets the boot sector and when you restart the system comes up quickly.
